# Allow all crawlers
User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://dolcenera.com/sitemap.xml

# Disallow admin and private areas
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /private/
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /_next/
Disallow: /static/

# Allow important pages
Allow: /services/
Allow: /solutions/
Allow: /about/
Allow: /contact/
Allow: /blog/
Allow: /case-studies/

# Crawl-delay for all bots
Crawl-delay: 10
